text: National Palace Museum of Korea () is a museum in Jongno District, Seoul. It was opened in 1908 and reopened in Gyeongbok Palace in 2005. It has royal relics of Joseon Dynasty. It also has 3 National Treasures of Korea. == Other websites == * National Palace Museum of Korea Category:1900s establishments in Korea Category:1908 establishments Category:2005 establishments in South Korea Category:Museums in Seoul Category:National museums of South Korea
title: National Palace Museum of Korea
